thread.title: Sam Smith announces In the Lonely Hour: The Drowning Shadows Edition - Music
thread.title_full: Sam Smith announces In the Lonely Hour: The Drowning Shadows Edition - Music News - Digital Spy

author: Tasha Hegarty
title: Sam Smith announces In the Lonely Hour: The Drowning Shadows Edition - Music
text: Sam Smith is releasing an extended version of his In the Lonely Hour album, featuring new tracks, covers and collaborations.In the Lonely Hour: The Drowning Shadows Edition includes new song 'Drowning Shadows', a ballad co-written by Sam and Fraser T Smith. The album also has covers of Amy Winehouse's 'Love Is a Losing Game' and Whitney Houston's 'How Will I Know?', alongside brand new collaborations with A$AP Rocky, Mary J Blige and John Legend.The full tracklist is as follows:Disc 11. Money on My Mind2. Good Thing3. Stay with Me4. Leave Your Lover5. I'm Not the Only One6. I've Told You Now7. Like I Can8. Life Support9. Not in That Way10. Lay Me Down11. Restart12. Latch (Acoustic)13. La La La14. Make It to MeDisc 21. Drowning Shadows2. Love Is a Losing Game3. Nirvana4. How Will I Know?5. Omen (Acoustic) feat. Disclosure6. Latch feat. Disclosure (Live from Madison Square Garden, New York)7. Stay with Me feat. Mary J Blige8. I'm Not the Only One feat. A$AP Rocky9. Lay Me Down feat. John LegendIn the Lonely Hour: The Drowning Shadows Edition will be released on November 6.Sam has just released 'Writing's on the Wall' from the new James Bond film Spectre, along with a 17-second teaser clip from the video.The track is currently on course to become the first number one Bond theme in the UK.The 23-year-old recently said that Spectre's director Sam Mendes stepped in during early drafts of the track to make sure it sounded as strong as possible.Watch Sam Smith talk about 'Writing's on the Wall' below: function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.STOP, onVideoStop); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.PROGRESS, onVideoProgress); } #_containermyExperience4508697852001 { height: 100%; } // InSkin integration parameters: InSkinParams['myInSkin14508697852001'] = { 'srv_SectionID': '', 'srv_SectionIDPlay': '123757', 'srv_Keywords': '', 'plr_ContentID': 'myExperience4508697852001', 'plr_ContentType': 'BRIGHTCOVE3', 'plr_ContentW': 558, 'plr_ContentH': 314, 'plr_NoSkinContentResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinContentW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinContentH': 348, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinH': 348, 'plr_ResizeOnHideSkin': true, 'plr_HideSkinOnExternalAd': 'all', 'plr_ShowSkinAfterExternalAd': true, 'cnt_SmartPlayer': true }; // create the InSkin object: var InSkinObject4508697852001 = new InSkin.Base('myInSkin14508697852001'); brightcove.createExperiences(); if (!navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)) { InSkinObject4508697852001.init(); ai_type="video"; }
